attributes.action: Allow Gordon Brown to use the campaign Song "You're The Best Thing"- D-Ream
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think the labour government should end as they started. Tony Blair won the government with the totally vibrant song "Things can only get better". I propose that Gordon Brown adopt this fantastic melody as his future theme tune. Many Thanks in advance for your vote in this petition. Peace be with you always and forever.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
